ft a finger to do anything, even if

to bust the other ... oh, 300 or

  Yup,=
 KSL, I said sorry 'cause the arm's your char.

  And Kluster is still a Ma=
ximal, he ain't in the Alliance base. 
  DevilDuer is standing in the CR ro=
om, though, right next to the 
  chambers.

  ::Zardus/WarMachine::

  Zard=
us turns around as he hears a bot's voice, seeing Najah. He lands 
  near t=
he bot.

  "I am Zardus, Alliance commander," he introduces himself, "You'r=
e 
  looking to join?"

  He figured that since the bot wasn't firing, he w=
as either neutral or 
  on the Alliance.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  The missil=
es dig into WarMachine's chest, leaving smoking dents. The 
  gestalt stumb=
les forward, but regainst balance.

  Making his way back toward Minion, he=
 fires at Surge and Shokaract, 
  missiles and lasser shots streaming out a=
t them.



  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
  >=
 OOC: Hey, Shokaract just fired, Zardus is the one who made the arm 
  blow=
 off.

t

  > out. Well, he didn't remove me from egroups, and I just c=
orrected

a gestalt
